div.p: Get ready for the Dutch PHP Conference 2023 - Online Edition! 🚀 Join us on October 13 for an exciting day filled with tech talks and networking. Here's a sneak peek of what's in store:

ul.li: 🌐 Building the World: The Story behind Wolfi, the Linux undistro built for containers by Erika Heidi
🚀 Our Journey from Gitflow to Trunk Based Development by Ludovic Toison
🔍 Generics Aren't Coming by Brent Roose
📚 Internships - MBO / Medium Level Education by Sophie Fischer
🐘 How to Eat an ElePHPant: Modernize Your Legacy PHP Applications by Ayesh Karunaratne
🧠 Making PHP Smarter: Introduction of AI into PHP Applications by Adam Englander

div.p: This free, online conference day is hosted by Caneco! Don't miss out – secure your virtual seat now! 🎟️
Mark your calendars and stay tuned for more updates. Follow us on social media using #DPC23 to join the conversation. Let's make this year's DPC unforgettable! 🌟
